column5: So we took out a buddy whose never caught a muskie, while muskie fishing(he,s caught a couple of crackers(under 40) while bass fishin).Got him a good one,then got him a better one.Man is he hooked.
Good on ya Larry !!! We always remember our first, and dream about our second. I can't wait to try out my new equipment next year, and get a better one. Thanks for posting.   Paul
That last one is a real hog. Thanks for sharing.
Are they ever thick right now...  Sweet catch...
Good way to introduce your friend to muskies Larry, that's couple very nice fish there.
Great way to break into muskie fishing ... couple real beauties there.  Congrats to the fisherman.
